name: Patagonia Black Hole Duffle - Unisex
description:
Expedite gear-intensive missions with a tough, reliable bag. The Black Hole Duffle is highly weather-resistant, and protects your gear from rough handling. The U-shaped lid allows quick access to the main compartment, while two zippered internal mesh pockets keep small items organized. A padded bottom panel adds structure and helps cushion the load when it gets tossed out of the vehicle or dropped from the pack mule.Fabric is recycled polyester laminated with TPU film and treated with a DWR finish.Bound seams and water-resistant zippers are not watertight, but very water resistant.Webbing daisy chains on all 4 corners provide lash points for extra gear.U-shaped lid provides access to the main compartment.Zippered exterior pocket and 2 zippered internal mesh pockets.Bottom is padded with foam to add structure and protect contents.Carrying options include removable padded backpack style straps, webbing handles with a snap closure and haul loops at both of the short ends of the bag.

        Sustainability
